H1.text: who declared war on the united states four days after pearl harbor. Fascist Italy

H2.text: who declared war on the united states four days after pearl harbor. The Soviet Union

H3.text: who declared war on the united states four days after pearl harbor. Nazi Germany

A4.text: Germany, followed by the other Axis states, declared war on the United States in solidarity with Japan, citing as justification the American attacks on German war vessels that had been ordered by Roosevelt.
